title: Journey Orchestration Step Data Fetch Fields
description: During a step processing, we can have N data fetch on field groups AEP or custom. We have tried not to surface the field group notion and granularity

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journey/.title: Journey Orchestration for creating user journey.

fetchTotalTime.title: fetchTotalTime
fetchTotalTime.description: This Field describes the total amount of time spent in data fetch in millis during the step processing

fetchTypeInError.title: fetchTypeInError
fetchTypeInError.description: This Field defines if the fetch in error is on the platform or on a custom data source

fetchError.title: fetchError
fetchError.description: This Field describes the type of error that happens when the data fetch is processed.

fetchErrorCode.title: fetchErrorCode
fetchErrorCode.description: This Field describes the Code for fetch error. Present if the error has a code, such as an HTTP one. For instance, if the actionExecError is http, the code 404 represents the HTTP 404 error

fetchOrigError.title: fetchOrigError
fetchOrigError.description: This Field tells if there are any timeout or origin error

fetchCount.title: fetchCount
fetchCount.description: This Field gives the count , How many times the data is fetched, regardless of the type of source (AEP, custom)

fetchAepTotalTime.title: fetchAepTotalTime
fetchAepTotalTime.description: The total amount of time taken to fetch the data from Data Platform in millis

fetchAepCount.title: fetchAepCount
fetchAepCount.description: How many times the data is fetched from Platform (AEP)

fetchCustomTotalTime.title: fetchCustomTotalTime
fetchCustomTotalTime.description: Time to fetch the custom data in millis. Remark: this time is computed from the time the engine sends the enrichment event to the enrichment service and receive the response

fetchCustomCount.title: fetchCustomCount
fetchCustomCount.description: How many times the custom data is fetched from external systems
